mapper.select: /* 대국민포털_댓글기본 조회 (CmntMapper.getCmnt) */ SELECT cmnt_sn ,pst_sn ,cmnt_cn ,cmnt_enpswd ,use_yn ,rgtr_id ,reg_dt ,reg_prgrm_id ,mdfr_id ,mdfcn_dt ,mdfcn_prgrm_id FROM "KIDS_OWN"."TB_PP_M_CMNT" WHERE 1=1 AND cmnt_sn = #{cmntSn}
mapper.update: /* 대국민포털_댓글기본 수정 (CmntMapper.updateCmnt) */ UPDATE "KIDS_OWN"."TB_PP_M_CMNT" SET pst_sn = coalesce(#{pstSn}, pst_sn) ,cmnt_cn = coalesce(#{cmntCn}, cmnt_cn) ,cmnt_enpswd = coalesce(#{cmntEnpswd}, cmnt_enpswd) ,use_yn = coalesce(#{useYn}, use_yn) ,mdfr_id = coalesce(#{mdfrId}, mdfr_id) ,mdfcn_dt = now() ,mdfcn_prgrm_id = coalesce(#{mdfcnPrgrmId}, mdfcn_prgrm_id) WHERE 1=1 AND cmnt_sn = #{cmntSn}
